text: can anybody tell me what is the difference between the way bddtests are run on a local machine by a user (e.g. my laptop) and the way they are run on the CI server?
it seems they start up the same containers but after that cwd on my machine is different from the one on the CI machine (I mean in the container)
does anybody have an idea why did this test fail <https://travis-ci.org/hyperledger/fabric/builds/137467831>
